title: Teen dead after double shooting near ECMC
content:
Please install the latest Adobe Flash Player Plugin to watch this content.
BUFFALO, N.Y. (WIVB) — Two 16-year-olds were taken to ECMC after being shot just a few blocks away Thursday night.
Police say the shooting happened at Leroy Avenue and Hill Street just before 8 p.m.
16-year-old Kristian Piazza of Buffalo was pronounced dead and 16-year-old Terrell Lockett of Cheektowaga was treated and released from the hospital.
Anyone with information is asked to call the confidential tipline at 716-847-2255.
